# Bug note
> Step-by-step explanation of what situation occurred from the start to the bug

1. Go to '...'
2. Click on '....'
3. Scroll down to '....'
4. See error

## Expected result
> Write down the specific results that need to be corrected.

- write here

## References
> In the case of the view shown, a screenshot is also attached.

- write here
